attributes.action: OPEN A NORTHERN ROCK BANK IN ALL POST OFFICES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Northern Rock has been nationalized. Northern Rock are down sizing on staff and closing some branch offices. THOSE ARE FACTS.
Currently, Alliance and Leicester are the bank available in all post offices, It is proposed that all post offices change over to become agents for Northern Rock which will solve Post Office and Northern Rock closure  problems without painful downsizing.
